ai-tika-vin09t2:56_0: Wherever the observance-day procedure, the Sangha of monks consisting of a group of twenty, or twenty.
ai-tika-vin09t2:56_1: Though there is no single group of twenty (one),
ai-tika-vin09t2:56_2: for the Community is not able to discern the Sangha
ai-tika-vin09t2:56_3: Therefore the Sangha should say, “This must be told to do so.”
ai-tika-vin09t2:56_4: The group of five hundred leagues all round with the fourteenth sections for sixty-four thousand leagues.
ai-tika-vin09t2:56_5: That’s why a monk who has twenty years of seniority should apprehend the Sangha of monks.
ai-tika-vin09t2:56_6: while the Sangha says is said to be the best in the Vinaya percipient of the Simile of the Four Ways, or more than five hundred and fifty-footed.
ai-tika-vin09t2:56_7: Therefore it is said in groups less than twenty-four grounds for less than twenty, twenty-five, thirty-five, or forty-four years.”
ai-tika-vin09t2:56_8: Or alternatively, if it is due to the Sangha of monks, it should also be regarded as if possessed of them. This is the meaning.
ai-tika-vin09t2:56_9: Herein, this is the word of the word for which they give. Their probation should be understood for the trial period of six days when they give him probation.
ai-tika-vin09t2:56_10: Well then, this is said to be the promise of the King, like a lamp of unfinished space.
ai-tika-vin09t2:56_11: For the one who feels to begin it, there is no offense for one who is not an island.
ai-tika-vin09t2:57_0: The commentary on the color of an offense entailing suspension is finished.
